title: ocean week points stacking so quickly ._.
body: oh my...the bar'd be full by the time I play my next normal :/

replies.body: Yeah I must say OCE has come together and is smashing the goals!! GGWP!!!
we still have 5 days to go and we are nearly done, go OCE!
Btw is the 4 win ip boost out yet? I still can't seem to find it. Do I need more points?
You had to get a point BEFORE the IP boost was earned.
YEAH can we wait a bit until I can play LoL tomorrow THANKS OCE!
It takes up to 48 hours for the IP boost to release.
